text: This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:treasury}} each turn while this building exists.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_establish_pirate_cove}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\\nEstablishes a Pirate Cove in the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_colossal_deliverance}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\\nDamages the walls of the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_colossal_deliverance}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\\nDamages the walls of the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_ultimate_deliverance}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\\nDamages the walls, buildings, and lowers the settlement level of the target settlement.
Forest Spotting\\nEnemy units are unable to hide from this unit while in a forest.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_natures_wrath}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\\nDamages the walls, buildings, and lowers the settlement level of the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]Harden Armour[[/col]] (Assist Army)\\nIncreases the armour of the parent army.
[[col:yellow]]Sharpen Weapons[[/col]] (Assist Army)\\nIncreases the missile and melee damage of the parent army.
Daemonbane projectiles become magical and anti-large, and will home in on targets
Fireblood Toxin projectiles explode on impact and reduce enemy armour
Slow Death projectiles will deal additional damage over time and extra damage to low-health units, and are particularly effective against single entities
Toadskin Essence projectiles will deal additional damage to infantry and reduce their morale

River of Blood applies regional effects that decrease [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership for non-Chaos races, increase [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership for Chaos races, and increase [[img:icon_corruption_chs]][[/img]]Chaos corruption. Stacks up to three times.

River of Blood applies regional effects that decrease [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership for non-Chaos races, increase [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership for Chaos races, and increase [[img:icon_corruption_chs]][[/img]]Chaos corruption. Stacks up to three times.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_increase_mobility}}[[/col]] (Assist Army)\\nIncreases the campaign movement range of the parent army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_replenish_troops}}[[/col]] (Assist Army)\\nIncreases replenishment of the parent army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_scavenge}}[[/col]] (Assist Army)\\nIncreases the {{tr:icon_income}}income of post-battle loot earned by the parent army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_scouting}}[[/col]] (Assist Army)\\nIncreases the parent army's chance of finding a magic item after winning a battle.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_training}}[[/col]] (Assist Army)\\nIncreases experience gain for units serving in the parent army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_assault_unit}}[[/col]] (Target: Army)\\nInflicts damage upon a unit in the target army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_assault_units}}[[/col]] (Target: Army)\\nInflicts damage upon all units in the target army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_block_army}}[[/col]] (Target: Army)\\nModifies the campaign movement range of the target army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_hinder_replenishment}}[[/col]] (Target: Army)\\nModifies the replenishment of the target army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_assault_garrison}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\\nInflicts damage upon the garrison of the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_damage_building}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\\nInflicts damage upon a building in the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_damage_walls}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\\nDamages the walls of the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_boost_income}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\\nIncreases the income generated by buildings in the local province (reduces in enemy provinces).
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_increase_trade}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\\nIncreases tradable resources produced in the local province.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_cleanse_corruption}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\\nReduces the amount of [[img:icon_corruption_untainted]][[/img]]corruption in the local province.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_spread_corruption}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\\nIncreases the amount of [[img:icon_corruption_chs]][[/img]]Chaos corruption in the local province.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_spread_corruption}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\\nIncreases the amount of [[img:icon_corruption_kho]][[/img]]Khorne corruption in the local province.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_spread_corruption}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\\nIncreases the amount of [[img:icon_corruption_nur][[/img]]Nurgle corruption in the local province.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_spread_corruption}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\\nIncreases the amount of [[img:icon_corruption_skv]][[/img]]Skaven corruption in the local province.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_spread_corruption}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\\nIncreases the amount of [[img:icon_corruption_sla]][[/img]]Slaanesh corruption in the local province.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_spread_corruption}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\\nIncreases the amount of [[img:icon_corruption_tze]][[/img]]Tzeentch corruption in the local province.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_spread_corruption}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\\nIncreases the amount of [[img:icon_corruption_vmp]][[/img]]Vampiric corruption in the local province.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_spread_public_order}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\\nIncreases {{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} in the local province (reduces in enemy provinces).
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_spread_public_order}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\\nReduces {{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} in the local province.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_stimulate_growth}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\\nIncreases growth in the local province (reduces in enemy provinces).
[[col:yellow]]Catchweb Spidershrine[[/col]]\\nThis mount provides decreased Winds of Magic costs for spells and cooldown reduction.
[[col:yellow]]Blood of Hashut[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\\nRazes the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_funnel_magic}}[[/col]] (Assist Army)\\nAdds to the parent army's Winds of Magic power reserves each turn.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_protective_charms}}[[/col]] (Assist Army)\\nReduces [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition suffered by the parent army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_hags_cursemark}}[[/col]] (Target: Army)\\nThe target army starts battles with Winded vigour for 3 turns.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_siphon_winds}}[[/col]] (Target: Army)\\nReduces the target army's Winds of Magic reserves for 4 turns.

Stops the target army from moving entirely
Teleports any target army to the chosen Magical Forest
Armies summoned every other turn will be stronger
The target settlement's entire province income will be provided
The target settlement's province will not gain any additional corruption for the duration
Increases [[img:icon_income]][[/img]]income from all buildings and trade and adds "The Land Awakened" army ability.
Increases [[img:icon_replenishment]][[/img]]casualty replenishment rate, [[img:icon_growth]][[/img]]growth and [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]control of all provinces.

Break the [[img:icon_military_alliance]][[/img]]military or [[img:icon_defensive_alliance]][[/img]]defence alliance between two factions.
Force a rebellion in the region.
Force a war between two factions.
Give an offensive war co-ordination target to a faction.

Open the gates of a settlement with walls.
Reveal the shroud over all of a faction's territory.
Track and transfer an army's line of sight.
Transfer a settlement from one faction to another.
Mastery of the Elemental Winds. When more than one unit that share this attribute are in the same army, the power of spells cast is increased.
